messages.subject: slugs
messages.msgSnippet: Ren I think you are becoming blurred in your sensibilites as to what is generally acceptable, by what is acceptable in your own home. There is a difference. A
messages.messageBody:
"Ren

I think you are becoming blurred in your sensibilites as to what is
generally acceptable, by what is acceptable in your own home.

There is a difference. A big difference !

Try going to a toddler group, or anywhere where parents are with their young
children, and call one of the other children a slug, and see what reaction
you get !"

Chris,
I'm not sure what you missed in my post but none of what you said made a bit of sense. My sensibilites are not blurred, they are sharp as every thank you.
I never suggested calling any child a name in reference to their behavior, there was a joke made here that was taken wrong and I was defending the person that made the joke.
I only told how the term "Slug" was used by my dh in reference to HIMSELF (not a child) and I think you're trying to infer way too much.

Ren
